name: Durian
body:
### Durian
Automatically scan for Path of Exile items that suites your price. If an item matches your parameters, you'll get a notification.

### Download
Download the latest from: https://github.com/thirdy/durian/releases

### About
Durian is powered by Exile Tools Elastic Search Public API - http://api.exiletools.com/info/indexer.html
Blackmarket is fan-made and not affiliated with Grinding Gear Games in any way.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
